misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry with distinction. He has graced the fairways of this tournament in 7 past editions, securing the coveted Hector Trophée on two occasions. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, Daniel's consistent performance makes him a formidable competitor.

Known for his unwavering commitment to the sport, Daniel approaches each round with a blend of determination and sportsmanship. Those who have the pleasure of playing alongside him know him to always be a gentleman, though he is known to occasionally lose his temper on the course.
Although Daniel is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his continued activity in Hector events suggests that we may see him grace the course again in the future.
